block.p: Hingis vs. Venus Williams Top-seeded Martina Hingis defeated Monica Seles and will face Venus Williams in the semifinals of the U.S. Open. Magnus Norman was ousted. SPORTSWEDNESDAY, PAGE D1
40 Chinese Olympians Out Forty of China's 300 Olympic athletes have withdrawn, including seven rowers who failed blood tests, Olympic officials said. PAGE D1
Hingis vs. Venus Williams Top-seeded Martina Hingis defeated Monica Seles and will face Venus Williams in the semifinals of the U.S. Open. Magnus Norman was ousted. SPORTSWEDNESDAY, PAGE D1
40 Chinese Olympians Out Forty of China's 300 Olympic athletes have withdrawn, including seven rowers who failed blood tests, Olympic officials said. PAGE D1
Yankees Lose Cone David Cone dislocated his left shoulder diving for a bunt and will be out indefinitely. PAGE D1
